channel.title: Robotics on Mobile Robot I/O
channel.description: Recent content in Robotics on Mobile Robot I/O

item.title: Open Source Robotics Projects
item.description: I did not realize it at the time I started the MobileRobot.IO project that what I was setting out to build is what is commonly reffered to as a Rover. Basically a wandering vehicle typically to do some form of discovery. Rovers Here is a two wheeled Rover that connects an (Arduino and a Raspberry Pi over an I2C bus)[https://www.hackster.io/peejster/rover-c42139].
